p: Heterocyclic compounds were present in a considerable amount, with a total of five compounds identified. The most prominent was theaspirane a in all four cultivars, with the largest percentage in cv. Lastovka (9.17–12.21%) and in cv. Frantoio (10.68–13.54%). Vitispirane, dihydroedulan I and II were found in a slightly lower amount being the most abundant in cv. Lastovka, ranging from 0 to 1.37%.
